Carlsbad.Oceanside Municipal Airport: Oceanside Municipal Airport (IATA: OCN, ICAO: KOKB, FAA LID: OKB) is a public airport located two miles (3 km) northeast of the central business district of Oceanside, a city in San Diego County, California. The airport covers 43 acres (170,000 m2) and has one runway. It is mostly used for general aviation.
